product_name: Novara Haisley Woven Bike Top - Women's
long_description: You'll enjoy the ride as well as the post ride when you wear this women's Novara Haisley Woven Top. Shirt features fabric with stylish good looks for everyday wear and stealthy reflectivity. Shirt is made from a nylon/polyester/spandex fabric blend that draws moisture away from your body to the outer layer for quick evaporation. 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective yarns are woven throughout shirt for an increase in visibility to motorists. Stretch panels at sides and upper back allow moisture vapor to escape and provide ease of movement. Button front lets you control ventilation and allows easy on/off. Large rear zippered pocket holds the essentials; internal pocket keeps your smartphone- secure; includes cable port for your headphone cord. Shirt features an abundance of reflective hits to help boost your visibility to others: rollup right sleeve freatures reflective trim; pop collar reveals reflective logo. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: You'll enjoy the ride as well as the post ride when you wear this women's Novara Haisley Woven Top. Shirt features fabric with stylish good looks for everyday wear and stealthy reflectivity.
